basic.name: Basic Questions
basic.description: Simple factual questions suitable for all pipelines

queries.query: What is machine learning?
How does a neural network work?
What are the main types of machine learning?
What is the difference between AI and machine learning?
What programming languages are used for machine learning?

intermediate.name: Intermediate Questions
intermediate.description: More complex questions requiring deeper understanding

queries.query: How do you prevent overfitting in machine learning models?
What is the bias-variance tradeoff and why is it important?
Compare random forests and gradient boosting algorithms
How do convolutional neural networks process images?
What are the key considerations for feature engineering?

advanced.name: Advanced Questions
advanced.description: Complex, multi-faceted questions requiring comprehensive analysis

queries.query: How would you design a recommendation system for a large e-commerce platform, considering scalability, real-time updates, and cold start problems?
Explain the mathematical foundations of transformer architectures and their advantages over RNNs for natural language processing
What are the ethical implications of using machine learning in hiring decisions, and how can bias be mitigated?
Design a distributed machine learning system for training models on petabyte-scale datasets
How do you implement differential privacy in machine learning while maintaining model performance?

domain_specific.name: Domain-Specific Questions
domain_specific.description: Questions requiring specialized knowledge in specific domains

queries.query: How is machine learning used in drug discovery and what are the main challenges?
What role does machine learning play in autonomous vehicle perception systems?
How are machine learning models used for fraud detection in financial services?
What machine learning techniques are used for climate modeling and prediction?
How does machine learning enhance cybersecurity threat detection?

rag_specific.name: RAG-Specific Questions
rag_specific.description: Questions specifically designed to test RAG pipeline capabilities

queries.query: What are the key components of a retrieval-augmented generation system?
How do you evaluate the quality of retrieved documents in a RAG system?
Compare vector similarity search with traditional keyword search for document retrieval
What are the advantages of using reranking in RAG pipelines?
How does corrective RAG (CRAG) improve upon basic RAG implementations?

multi_hop.name: Multi-hop Reasoning
multi_hop.description: Questions requiring multiple steps of reasoning across different sources

queries.query: If transformer models use attention mechanisms and attention mechanisms help with long-range dependencies, how do transformers compare to LSTMs for sequence modeling?
Given that gradient descent is used for optimization and neural networks use backpropagation for training, what are the limitations of gradient-based optimization in deep learning?
Since overfitting occurs when models are too complex and regularization helps prevent overfitting, what regularization techniques work best for different types of neural networks?

pipeline_comparison.name: Pipeline Comparison Tests
pipeline_comparison.description: Scenarios specifically designed to highlight differences between RAG pipelines

scenarios.name: Relevance Test
scenarios.query: What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?

expected_differences.BasicRerank: Should provide more relevant, reordered results

scenarios.name: Complex Query Test
scenarios.query: How do attention mechanisms in transformers address the limitations of RNNs in handling long sequences?

expected_differences.BasicRAG: May retrieve separate documents about each concept
expected_differences.BasicRerank: Should prioritize documents that discuss both concepts
expected_differences.CRAG: Should validate relevance and potentially search for additional context
expected_differences.GraphRAG: Should leverage entity relationships between transformers, attention, and RNNs

metadata.description: Comprehensive sample queries for testing RAG pipeline capabilities
usage_notes: Basic queries are suitable for initial testing and demonstrations
Intermediate queries test deeper understanding and retrieval quality
Advanced queries challenge the system with complex, multi-faceted problems
Domain-specific queries test knowledge in specialized areas
RAG-specific queries are designed to test RAG system capabilities
Multi-hop queries require reasoning across multiple retrieved documents
